verses.verse: When he was <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2309>will,<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G2513>clean.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1614>put<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G2309>will;<s%> be you clean. <S%G2513><s%> And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> his <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3708>See<s%> you <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man;<s%> but <S%G5217>go<s%> your way, <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> and <S%G4374>offer<s%> the <S%G1435>gift<s%> that <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them.
And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> to him a <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> him,

And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> my <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G906>lies<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3614>home<s%> <S%G3885>sick<s%> of the <S%G3885>palsy,<s%> <S%G1171>grievously<s%> <S%G928>tormented.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, I will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2323>heal<s%> him.

The <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> that you should <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> my <S%G4721>roof:<s%> but <S%G2036>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> and my <S%G3816>servant<s%> shall be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

For I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> me: and I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> man, <S%G4198>Go,<s%> and he <S%G4198>goes;<s%> and to <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064>Come,<s%> and he <S%G2064>comes;<s%> and to my <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> and he <S%G4160>does<s%> it.

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, he <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> and <S%G4483>said<s%> to them that <S%G190>followed,<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3761>no,<s%> not in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> from the <S%G395>east<s%> and <S%G1424>west,<s%> and shall <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> with <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> to the <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> <S%G5217>Go<s%> your way; and as you have believed, <S%G4100><s%> so be it <S%G1096>done<s%> to you. And his <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> in the <S%G1565>selfsame<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4074>Peter's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> his <S%G3994>wife's<s%> <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G906>laid,<s%> and <S%G4445>sick<s%> of a <S%G4445>fever.<s%>
And he <S%G680>touched<s%> her <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> her: and she <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to them.

When the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with <S%G1139>devils:<s%> and he <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> with his <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2192>sick:<s%>

That it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> our <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> and <S%G941>bore<s%> our <S%G3554>sicknesses.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> him, he <S%G2753>gave<s%> <S%G2753>commandment<s%> to <S%G565>depart<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side.<s%>

And a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G4483>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> I will <S%G190>follow<s%> you <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G565>go.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, The <S%G258>foxes<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5454>holes,<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> have <S%G2682>nests;<s%> but the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> not <S%G4226>where<s%> to lay <S%G2827><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

And <S%G2087>another<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2010>suffer<s%> me <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G2290>bury<s%> my <S%G3962>father.<s%>
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>Follow<s%> me; and <S%G863>let<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2290>bury<s%> their dead. <S%G3498><s%>
And when he was <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>tempest<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4143>ship<s%> was <S%G2572>covered<s%> with the <S%G2949>waves:<s%> but he was <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>
And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, and <S%G1453>awoke<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> us: we <S%G622>perish.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> are you <S%G1169>fearful,<s%> O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>

But the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4217>What<s%> <S%G4217>manner<s%> of man is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> him!

And when he was <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gergesenes,<s%> there <S%G5221>met<s%> him <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with <S%G1139>devils,<s%> <S%G1831>coming<s%> out of the <S%G3419>tombs,<s%> <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5467>fierce,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2480>might<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> by that <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> have we to do with you, <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> you <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> are you <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> to <S%G928>torment<s%> us <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time?<s%>
And there was a <S%G3112>good<s%> <S%G3112>way<s%> <S%G575>off<s%> from them an <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding.<s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> the <S%G1142>devils<s%> <S%G3870>sought<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G1544>cast<s%> us out, <S%G2010>suffer<s%> us to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine.<s%>

And he <S%G4483>said<s%> to them, Go. <S%G5217><s%> And when they were <S%G1831>come<s%> out, they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine:<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G3729>ran<s%> violently <S%G2596>down<s%> a <S%G2911>steep<s%> place <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G599>perished<s%> in the <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And they that <S%G1006>kept<s%> them <S%G5343>fled,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> their ways <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> thing, and <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G4876>befallen<s%> to the <S%G1139>possessed<s%> of the <S%G1139>devils.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out to <S%G4877>meet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> and when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, they <S%G3870>sought<s%> him that he would <S%G3327>depart<s%> out of their <S%G3725>coasts.<s%>
